data.name: DaCapo Delivers
data.detailed_description:
Set in the 1930s, in a nameless city very much like Chicago, you play as Sal DaCapo, a young man with ambitions. Start by supplying groceries to Mom and Pop's Pasta Place and Speakeasy while you case the scene. Don't be deceived by the first training levels, you'll be speeding along juggling your money and stock soon enough. An aspiring mob boss needs an incredible amount of supplies to support his mob and his gold-digger girlfriend, and there's only limited time to do it or go broke.
Supported Aspect Ratios: 16:10, 16:9
data.about_the_game:
Set in the 1930s, in a nameless city very much like Chicago, you play as Sal DaCapo, a young man with ambitions. Start by supplying groceries to Mom and Pop's Pasta Place and Speakeasy while you case the scene. Don't be deceived by the first training levels, you'll be speeding along juggling your money and stock soon enough. An aspiring mob boss needs an incredible amount of supplies to support his mob and his gold-digger girlfriend, and there's only limited time to do it or go broke.
Supported Aspect Ratios: 16:10, 16:9
data.short_description: A quick shopping game which increases in difficulty for 16 levels. You play as Sal DaCapo, a young boy in the 1930s. Start by supplying groceries to Mom and Pop's Pasta Place and Speakeasy, advance to have your own rackets, mob, and gun moll as the top boss.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Hungarian, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 or better / AMD FX-8320 or better.
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 (2GB) / AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2GB) or better.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8600K 3.6 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 2600X 3.6 GHz
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 or AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
